title: After Being Proposed To By The Villain - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Polygamy   Reincarnated in a Game World   Transmigration
author: 吾有八宗罪
description: A human being from another world, crossed over as a hero… into the bed of the female demon villain?! If I hadn’t established marriage contracts with all the villains in the game before crossing over into its word, I’d be a dead man. Now the villains are pestering me, making me assist them in dominating the world, contending for my hand in marriage, what should I do?! Stuck in the game… emergency!!!>
